One can type your codes in Console, when `+` appears in the console, you can press `esc` to escape.

```{r}
print(2^53)
print(2^53,digits=20)
print(2^53+1,digits=20) # +1, but the result is unchanged
```

```{r}
#install.packages("bit64")
```

```{r}
library(bit64)
print(as.integer64(2)^53,digits=20)
print(as.integer64(2)^53+1,digits=20)
```
